description:
Endpoint Behavior Analysis System

iMonitor (Endpoint Behavior Analysis System) [A must-have tool for security analysts] is an endpoint behavior monitoring and analyzing software based on iMonitorSDK.
It supports monitoring processes, files, registry, network and other system behaviors. It supports extensions and scripts, making it easier to customize and add more functions. It can be used for virus analysis, reverse engineering, intrusion detection, EDR, etc.
